dublin_core.dcvalue: This paper describes a conceptual framework and human factors evaluation for usability assessment of commercially available telemedicine technology Four criteria of human factors evaluation are utilized 1 technical acceptability 2 operational effectiveness 3 clinical appropriateness and 4 equipment selection These criteria were applied to commercially available video otoscope systems for otological evaluations
Made available in DSpace on 2020-02-12T12:24:44Z (GMT). No. of bitstreams: 0 Previous issue date: 2000-08-22
Telemedicine journal : the official journal of the American Telemedicine Association
A usability evaluation for telemedicine medical equipment.
